Desc.entry: An Industrial and Provident Society whose membership currently comprises a dozen community organisations. Member organisations provide a range of services on the 4 acre campus that include a community day nursery, an after school club, a DFES-approved school for children with severe disabilities, a sports centre, a community cafe, an adult training provider, a computer recycling project (see separate entry), children's play centre, Leaping the Void (see separate entry), Abbey Care (provides carers and transport. Also has an art gallery with local artists exhibiting their work. Aims to support its members through incubation support, sharing best practices and maintaining the campus.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm (office times); 1st Tues in the month at 10am (committee meeting)
